dt.t: … a closer feeling of brotherhood, a more efficient sense of {wi}neighborhood{/wi} …
… refugees from the country, driven by fear or the {wi}neighborhood{/wi} of armies.
traveled to a place somewhere in the {wi}neighborhood{/wi} of that city

dt: {bc}a section lived in by neighbors and usually having distinguishing characteristics

{bc}the set {dx_def}see {dxt|set:2||21}{/dx_def} of all points belonging to a given set whose distances from a given point are less than a given positive {dx_def}see {dxt|positive:1||4e}{/dx_def} number

shortdef: the quality or state of being neighbors : proximity
a place or region near : vicinity
